title: folk_tales_Jupiter_and_the_Monkey
text:
source: https://fairytalez.com/jupiter-and-the-monkey/.
nation: greek.
title: Jupiter and the Monkey.
text: Jupiter issued a proclamation to all the beasts, and offered a prize to the one who, in his judgment, produced the most beautiful offspring. Among the rest came the Monkey, carrying a baby monkey in her arms, a hairless, flat-nosed little fright. When they saw it, the gods all burst into peal on peal of laughter; but the Monkey hugged her little one to her, and said, “Jupiter may give the prize to whomsoever he likes: but I shall always think my baby the most beautiful of them all.”.
